---
title: "r-data-exploration"
format: html
---
load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```
explore diamond data set
```{r}
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)

#create pairs plot
ggpairs(diamonds)
```
basic ggplot
```{r}
ggplot(data=diamonds, aes(x=price, y=carat))+
  geom_point()
```
histogram for carat distribution
```{r}
ggplot(data=diamonds, aes(x=carat))+
  geom_histogram()
```
boxplot of diamond clarity
```{r}
ggplot(data=diamonds, aes(x=clarity, y=price))+
  geom_boxplot()
```
